short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Give the perfect pitch. Bring presentations to life with Pivo Pod’s Auto-Tracking.
short.ja: 完璧なプレゼンを実現します。 Pivo Presentで臨場感たっぷりに。

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Give the perfect pitch. Bring presentations to life with Pivo Pod’s Auto-Tracking.

Whether you're a teacher, account manager, business owner or someone who just wants to give insanely awesome presentations, Pivo Present is the perfect solution to take them to the next level. With access to auto-tracking, our various presentation modes and remote capabilities, leave a lasting impression on your audience.

With Pivo Present, you gain:

- The ability to record and share your presentation in Google Chrome
- 4 customizable presentation modes
- 3 different tracking modes
- Control with your Pivo Remote Control 

Pivo Present is designed to be used in the following conditions:

- User must download the Pivo Present Chrome extension in addition to this app
- User must have a Pivo Pod and Pivo Account to sign into Pivo Present
